verses.roman:
daśame--kahiluṅ bhakta-datta-āsvādana
rāghava-paṇḍitera tāhāṅ jhālira sājana

synonyms: daśame—in the Tenth Chapter; kahiluṅ—I have described; bhakta-datta-āsvādana—the tasting of the food given by the devotees; rāghava-paṇḍitera—of Rāghava Paṇḍita; tāhāṅ—therein; jhālira sājana—the assortment in the bags.
translation: In the Tenth Chapter I have described how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu tasted the food given by His devotees, and I have also described the assortments in the bags of Rāghava Paṇḍita.
